maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.orig: And this... is the cliff side.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.text: Et ici... se trouve les falaises.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.orig: It's where you realize...\. that this place is actually pretty small.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.text: C'est ici que l'on se rend compte...\. que cet endroit est assez petit en fait.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.orig: And yes...\. there is indeed no exit.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.text: Et oui...\. Il n'y a vraiment aucune sortie.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.orig: Well actually...\. There is that one door just over here!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.text: Bon, en fait...\. Il y a peut-être cette porte là-bas !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.orig: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Spiral Cliff\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/372/sett.text: Parlez à Lukas dans les \c[3]Spirales de Falaises à \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer sa visite.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.orig: I have no idea where it leads but it's as close as it gets to an exit.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.text: J'ai aucune idée de là où elle mène, mais c'est ce qui ressemble le plus à une sortie.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.orig: I didn't plan to end the tour on such a depressing note.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.text: Je n'avais pas prévu de terminer cette visite de manière aussi déprimante.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.orig: Actually, now that I think about it...\. there is one more thing I'd like to show you!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.text: En fait, maintenant que j'y pense...\. Il y a encore une chose que je voudrais te montrer !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.orig: We'll have to run back all the way to the \c[3]East Town\c[0], though.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.text: Il va falloir revenir vers la \c[3]Cité Est\c[0], par contre.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.orig: What? Is the old granny tired already?
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.text: Quoi ? La vielle mémère n'a déjà plus de jambes ?

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.orig: Go back to \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - East Town\c[0] to conclude Lukas' tour.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/373/sett.text: Revenez à la \c[3]Cité Est de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour conclure la visite de Lukas.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: You feel like this has happened before...
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Vous sentez comme un air de déjà-vu.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Do you want to skip ahead to the Vermillion Dungeon?
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Voulez-vous sauter cette partie jusqu'au \v[area.arid-dng-2.name] ?

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Yes
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Oui

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: No
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Non

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Whoa! What a gloomy place!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Wouah ! Il est bien sinistre cet endroit !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: How unexpected! Now I really wonder about the history of this location.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: C'est si surprenant ! Maintenant je me pose vraiment des questions sur l'histoire de ce lieu.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: There is time for that later, we need to hurry!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Ce n'est pas le moment, il faut se dépêcher !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Hm.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Hum.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: What a large company.\. Unexpected.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Je me serais attendu à moins de monde.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Hey, is this that Sidwell guy?!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Hé, Ce type, là, c'est Sidwell ?!

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: You all should be perfectly aware that this area is off limits.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Vous devriez déjà savoir que cet endroit est en dehors des limites.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Leave at once unless you want all your accounts to be suspended.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Quittez cet endroit sur le champ si vous ne voulez pas que vos comptes soient bannis.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Everyone, do not listen to him.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Les gars, n'écoutez pas ce qu'il dit.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: He cannot risk reporting this through official channels!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Il ne peut pas se permettre de signaler ça via les canaux officiels !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Foul Villain!!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Infâme Vilain !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Your empty threats will not stop us!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Ce n'est pas vos vaines menaces qui nous arrêteront !
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.note: empty thread is this, not menaces en l'air (idle thread)

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Oui! Nothing will turn us back now!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Oui ! Plus rien nous arrêtera maintenant !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: So what is it you are after?\. The server?
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Et que venez-vous cherchez ici ?\. Le serveur ?

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: It will be impossible for you to reach.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Parce que pour vous, il sera impossible à atteindre.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: And even if you did, its data will be lost before you get there.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Et même si vous y arriviez, ses données seront perdues avant même que vous y soyez.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: And then you'd lose the sole copy of every Evotar.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Et comme ça vous perdrez la seule copie de tous les Évotars.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Including Satoshi.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Y compris Satoshi.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: That's right!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: C'est vrai !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: The Evotar server is your last hostage.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Le serveur des Évotars est votre dernier otage.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: A hostage you can't afford to lose!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Un otage que vous ne pouvez pas vous permettre de perdre !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: You'd be wise not to overestimate my attachment to all of this.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Vous feriez mieux de ne pas surestimer mon attachement à toutes ces choses là.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.note: de: Vous faites erreur si vous pensez que tout cela est aussi important pour moi.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Anyway...
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: De toute façon...

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: I'll humor your attempt.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Je peux bien vous laisser essayer.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: But I won't let you stroll around unhindered.
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: Mais je ne vais pas vous laisser vous balader tranquillement comme ça.

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: The barrier is down! Time to split, everyone!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: La barrière est tombée ! Dispersez-vous tout le monde !

maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.orig: Onwards!!
maps/arid/cliff-1.json/entities/436/sett.text: En avant !!
